title: You Are My Destiny
resume: You Are My Destiny is a South Korean high rated television drama broadcast on KBS1 from May 5, 2008 to January 9, 2009 for 178 episodes. It stars Im Yoona, a member of Girls' Generation, in her first leading role. Her performance was praised by critics and netizens which lead to her winning numerous important recognitions in acting. This drama peaked the rating of 41% in its final episode.
